price: Rabbiin isaan amananii gaggaarii hojjatan, isaaniif araaramaafi mindaa guddaatu jira (jechuun) waadaa seeneera.
arabic: وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَأَجۡرٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: waʿada al-lahu alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun ʿaẓīmun
